
**Less than:**

```{r}
my_number <- 74

if (my_number < 100) {
    cat(my_number, "is less than 100")
}
```

<br/>

**Equal to:**


```{r}
my_number <- 74

if (my_number == 100) {
    cat(my_number, "== 100") }
if (my_number == 74) {
    cat(my_number, "== 74") }
```

<br/>

**Not equal to:**

```{r}
my_number <- 74

if (my_number != 100) {
    cat(my_number, "!= 100")
}

if (my_number != 74) {
    cat(my_number, "!= 74")
}
```
